FATE restaurant is run by Li Zhang and Jian Fei Chen. Li, a graduate of Hospitality management in DIT, is no stranger to the dining customs of Ireland having lived here for almost 11 years. Similarly Jian Fei has vast experience in the restaurant business having previously run a restaurant in Navan, Co. Meath. Finally, the culinary skills and expertise are brought to the business by our Head Chef Xu Chen who has been a chef for almost fifteen years. Once you have tasted a dish prepared by Chef Xu we’ re sure you’ll agree he is an exceptional talent in his field.
FATE restaurant can be found in the bustling town of Naas in Co. Kildare. Serving both Asian and European styled food; FATE strives to cater for people who like something a little different. An authentic Asian meal can be had and if so desired, mashed potatoes can be served on the side for those who still like to taste a little bit of Ireland! We also take pride in catering for those special occasions such as birthday parties, special Valentine’s romantic dinners, Hen parties, leaving parties and many more. Of course we also cater for the seasonal office Christmas parties with excellent rates to suit all. Please don’t hesitate to contact us for more details and we will be delighted to help you. Finally, we also cater also for those who like to comfort of the sofa with a swift delivery service for our Asian food direct to the home.
We, at FATE restaurant, also realise that in the current economic climate that people expect value for money and keen prices. We promise to offer a fine dining experience in beautiful surroundings at a price significantly less than what you would expect to pay and certainly a lot less than our competitors.
So there is only one way to find out what our combination of skills offers in terms of a dining experience. Come in or order out, which ever you prefer and prepare for a taste sensation!!
